description: Merlot is a dry red wine which is smooth and medium bodied.
Chardonnay is a dry white wine which is bold and full bodied.
Malbec is a dry red wine which is bold and full bodied.
Riesling is a white wine which is crisp and light bodied.
Cabernet Sauvignon is a dry red wine which is bold and full bodied.
Pinot Noir is a dry red wine which is light and fruity.
Sauvignon Blanc is a dry white wine which is smooth and medium bodied.
Shiraz is a dry red wine which is bold and full bodied.
Zinfandel is a dry red wine which is bold and full bodied.
Tempranillo is a dry red wine which is smooth and medium bodied.
Grenache is a dry red wine which is smooth and medium bodied.
